ack.p: The authors thank Masaya Kato, Nguyen To Nhu, and Family Health International for their support, and in particular their help with data acquisition. We also thank Maciej Boni, Jon Zelner, Jonathan Dushoff, David Wilson, Pejman Rohani, Andrea Graham, C. Jessica E. Metcalf, Simon Levin and the HIV Modelling Consortium for valuable insight and discussions.
